import React from 'react'; import { Database, Code2, Globe, Server, Zap, TrendingUp, Star } from 'lucide-react'; const Skills: React.FC = () => { const skillCategories = [ { icon: , title: "Backend Development", color: "from-blue-500 to-blue-600", skills: [ { name: "Java", level: 95, experience: "3+ years", icon: "‚òï" }, { name: "Spring Framework", level: 90, experience: "2+ years", icon: "üçÉ" }, { name: "JWT Authentication", level: 85, experience: "2+ years", icon: "üîê" }, { name: "Apache Tomcat", level: 80, experience: "2+ years", icon: "üê±" }, { name: "REST APIs", level: 88, experience: "2+ years", icon: "üåê" } ] }, { icon: , title: "Databases & Data", color: "from-purple-500 to-purple-600", skills: [ { name: "MySQL", level: 85, experience: "2+ years", icon: "üê¨" }, { name: "MongoDB", level: 80, experience: "1+ years", icon: "üçÉ" }, { name: "NumPy", level: 75, experience: "1+ years", icon: "üìä" }, { name: "Pandas", level: 70, experience: "1+ years", icon: "üêº" }, { name: "Data Analysis", level: 78, experience: "1+ years", icon: "üìà" } ] }, { icon: , title: "Frontend & Web", color: "from-green-500 to-green-600", skills: [ { name: "HTML5", level: 90, experience: "3+ years", icon: "üåê" }, { name: "CSS3", level: 85, experience: "3+ years", icon: "üé®" }, { name: "JavaScript", level: 75, experience: "2+ years", icon: "‚ö°" }, { name: "Responsive Design", level: 80, experience: "2+ years", icon: "üì±" }, { name: "Web Development", level: 82, experience: "3+ years", icon: "üíª" } ] }, { icon: , title: "DevOps & Tools", color: "from-orange-500 to-orange-600", skills: [ { name: "Git & GitHub", level: 90, experience: "3+ years", icon: "üìö" }, { name: "Maven/Gradle", level: 80, experience: "2+ years", icon: "üì¶" }, { name: "Postman", level: 85, experience: "2+ years", icon: "üìÆ" }, { name: "IntelliJ IDEA", level: 88, experience: "2+ years", icon: "üÜî" }, { name: "VS Code", level: 85, experience: "2+ years", icon: "üíª" } ] } ]; const additionalSkills = [ "Microservices Architecture", "JUnit Testing", "Swagger/OpenAPI", "OAuth2", "GraphQL", "WebSocket", "Redis", "Docker Basics", "AWS Basics", "CI/CD Pipelines", "Agile/Scrum", "Problem Solving", "Android Development (Learning)", "Kotlin Basics", "Mobile App Development" ];
